Items.Title: Resolution calling on New York State Legislature to pass, and the Governor to sign, S.3179/A.5557, which would repeal the “Urstadt law” and allow New York City to regulate residential rents.
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Rent Regulations Package - Repeal the “Urstadt law” (S.3179/A.5557)

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York State Legislature to pass, and the Governor to sign, S.6527/A.6285, which limits rent increases on renewal of rent stabilized units where a preferential rent was being charged.
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Rent Regulations Package - Limits rent increases on renewal of rent stabilized units where a preferential rent was being charged. (S.6527/A.6285)

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York State Legislature to pass, and the Governor to sign, S.1593/A.9815, in relation to repealing the vacancy bonus.
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Rent Regulations Package - Repealing the vacancy bonus. (S.1593/A.9815)

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York State Legislature to pass, and the Governor to sign, legislation extending the statute of limitations for rent overcharges.
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Rent Regulations Package - Extending the statute of limitations for rent overcharges.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York State Legislature to pass and the Governor to sign S.4312, legislation amending the Administrative Code of the City of New York, the Emergency Tenant Protection Act of 1974 and the Emergency Housing Rent Control Law, in relation to making the Major Capital Improvement (MCI) rent increase a temporary surcharge.
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Rent Regulations Package - Making the Major Capital Improvement (MCI) rent increase a temporary surcharge. (S.4312)

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York State Legislature to pass, and the Governor to sign, S.3482/A.433, in relation to repealing vacancy decontrol.
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Rent Regulations Package - Repealing vacancy decontrol. (S.3482/A.433)

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York State Legislature to pass, and the Governor to sign, S.6925/A.268, which will provide rent control tenants relief from high rent increases.

Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Rent Regulations Package - Provide rent control tenants relief from high rent increases. (S.6925/A.268)

Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Rent Regulations Package - Extend rent stabilization to unregulated apartments.
